message.body: Idk if ur still awake but I love you :)
I love you too. =) Knocking out phonetics final today, woo! How's your day looking?
Gonna finish that portfolio today and then study for multicultural America
That sounds like.....fun.......
So much fun I can't contain myself.....
Come trade with me! Sort out some paperwork for the principal of Neighborhood School! (Or join me!$
Aw bummer. =\ Writing portfolios are laaaame
Super laaaaaame
On an unrelated note: can we see The Hobbit when we're both done with school?
YESSSSSSS. (You didn't see it yet, did you? Haha)
No I havnt because I'm stuck here at school :(
Car! Get car!
Maybe next year =p
If Pickem lasts the year... =P
This is very true haha it's seen better days =p
Poor Pickem...I love her =P
Me too, she's a tough broad =p
"tough broad"...I feel like we're in the roaring 20's
It's just the truth =p lolz
I finished!!! :)
Haha. She is a tough old broad....how's dat writing going?
2 actually, speech exam and multicultural America
I'm so proud of you! Now you just have one test to study for =)
You got this, babe!!!
Blah blah blah =p
Don't dismiss me when I'm being a cheerleader!!
Ur cute ya know that =p
YES U R!! I think the lost boys r going to hooters tonight =p lo
Lol
Nope =P
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
(Inhale) AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
I figured u would have such a reaction =p lolz
The prospect delights me =P
To bad I have to money =p
I'm sure the guys could spot you =P
They have already been spotting me =p
You should just start selling meth =P
Oh totally.....
Trying to think of ways to get quick easy money.....
That are legal....
Nothing that I care to do =p
Yeeeeaaaaahhhh lolz
Damnit
Little unfortunate..... Lolz
Sperm donor! Lab rat! Sell all your belongings!
But I need my belongings =p
That's fair.... =P I was actually thinking of going on a mass game/movie selling spree over break. Pick up a couple bucks
That might be a good idea actually :)
And then I can buy us pretty things =P
Haha we can't have nice things =p
WHY
Cause we always say that we can't have nice things =p
Usually because one of us is being stupid/klutzy. Per usual
This is very true haha and let's face it.... It's one sided...... I'm such a clutz
.......I can't tell if that's sarcastic, because *have you met me*?
Have u met me!?!? Trolol
Maybe we're both a little klutzy ☺
Maybe just a smidge =p
￼New class schedule, with two educational theatre classes =)
Ooooooo no days off but very nice :)
Not shabby at all :) im proud =p
No days off, but my Mondays start at 12pm/Fridays end at 3pm (with work). So it's really not too shabby =P
Haha, I thought you'd appreciate that. I COULD always put in more hours and start at like....9....
Eeeehhhhh, idk about that =p
Another $30 a week, versus another 3 hours of sleep a night....decisions....
Yikes, that is a rough decision.....
We'll see how broke I am come February. =P Oh wait! I meant to ask you, when are you getting your wisdom teeth out?
No idea, never went to the dentist and I'm not in pain =p
Aww man, I thought we'd be drugged up chipmunks together =P
Wait r u getting urs out!?
Yup, January 10. I'm not in pain, but apparently they're impacted and going to grow in horribly =P
Oh noes!!! My poor cutie :(
It's okay! I'll get to watch movies for like two days straight
Sounds wonderful, I'll come and watch with u :)
Aww, you're sweet. =) You really want to spend time with your drugged up girlfriend...? Haha
Yes, it's gonna be hysterical =p
Yooooou're a jerk!
Yeah yeah I know =p
Still there haha
Hehe. =P How was Hooter's? Lolol
Hot damn =P
We're chillin out talking with one of ray's friend, she works here =p
....lucky guy! Hahaha
Too bad he is already trying to date someone else =p
Someone I know??
Do u know meg Larson?
Um....name rings a bell. I've heard it thrown around
They're kinda a thing now, she's very pretty =p
Aww good! I approve of that, then. Your friends deserve pretty girls.
Indubitably she's actually like a really cool girl :)
Always a good thing! Where did she come from?
Uh I believe she's a freshman now, idk where she's from
Is she in players?
(That was probably how I should have opened)
Yes she is, she was in rocky
Ah, that makes sense. Very very cool =)
So what r u up to?
Just chilling in bed, mentally preparing for my 4 hour study session with Lisa tomorrow =P
That's sounds like a blast!!!...... Loljk
Thrilled.....who starts a final at 6pm? Haha
NYU?
Yes....yes we do.... Dumb school
Laaaaaaammme
I know, right!? But I'm going to catch some Z's so I can make it through tomorrow. Goodnight baby, I love you! Enjoy your night with the guys =)
Good night cutie, I love you too, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
In physiology textbook : "Babies are about 75 percent water. This accounts for their dewy skin, like that of a freshly picked peach."
I mean that's one way to describe it but aren't all humans no matter what age made of 75% water? Lolz
Women are 50% water, men are 60% water, babies are 75% water. Boom! Science!
I have a hard time believing this =p
I'm just going with straight water, not necessarily bodily fluid =P
Eh I don't like this information, I do not trust ur text book, I MUST DO RESEARCH!!!
You don't trust my text or my professor.....okay, sweetie, do research if you must =P
The opinion of one man can not be takin lightly on such scientific matters =p
......okay, Kevin. =P Do you have other things to be studying for? Haha
I mean I have a speech final but idk how much I need to study for that =p
Haha. Just the one? You lucky dog
I know, I'm pretty excited :)
And you're done tomorrow?
Yup yup :) then I'll b home :)
Beats me, earliest around 4 I think =p
Oh boo, that's when my final starts P=
=P
Laaaaaaame
Oh! What time is the wedding? I need to request off from work, haha
I don't know off the top of my head actually =p
Haha, no worries. I think I have till next week to do so
I'll get that info tomorrow
Thank you! No worries baby =)
ALL THE WORRIES!!!
IT MEANS NO WORRIES FOR THE REST OF YOUR DAYS
Oooo good call =p classic
I had to. =P Okay, my brain is going to explode if I keep looking at these notes. We've been going for 3 hours straight, and I studied for an hour before that
Dear lord take a break!!!!
NO REST FOR THE WICKED
But there is rest for little cuties like u, now rest!!
Taking a hot chocolate break....this will do =P
That's a good idea :)
Hey, you're a man of science....wanna take this for me?
Oh totes brah, I'm in da zone =p
......You're fired
But but but..... Fiiiiiiine
WAIT I take it back please trade with me please
Lolz ur cute =p
You're much cuter than I am! You are a
PUPPIES!!!!!!
￼DOG FRIENDS
All the puppies!!!! I'm heading to an impeachment meeting for Carey....
Yeah some people r not very happy with him so both the e-board and carey will present their cases and then we all vote
Oh yikes....what happened that people are upset about?
It appears he just has not been doing his job very well
Oh jeez. That's scary....
Well he decided to officially resign before we even went through the process of impeachment in a good manner :)
Indeed :)
That sounds like the best solution for everyone =)
=) I'm heading home now, physiology went decently well
Oh good!!! :)
Yup yup! Just two more finals to go. What are you up to tonight?
Brawling as of right now =p
Oooooh, that sounds like a wonderful night =)
Tis =p
Beats my night....my pal Laurie and I are doing a Skype study session =P
ALLLLLL night =P
Dear lord, DRAMA BOMBS!!!! I'll have to tell u what is going on later =p
.....DRAMA BOMBS!!?
Why is there no photographic evidence of you with a beard!?
I have a hard time believing this, I'm sure there's one somewhere
I don't have any picture of it on my phone, my friend Laurie and I are talking about No Shave November =P
That's a chinstrap
Still a beard =p
Yeah idk about that =p
NO NO! Like when you had a ginger beard
I'm bummed out now. =( haha
Why do u need evidence of this? Lol
Because we were talking about No Shave November, and your ginger beard made me giggle =P
Hahaha who were u talking to, someone from school?
Lolz whatevs =p
Yeah, my friend Laurie! We discovered that we're like the same person......aaaaand that we should double date maybe
So that's a yes?
Yeah sure, do we have to go to the city? Lol
Ideally yes, she's at NYU and he's visiting from Cali over spring break...but we don't have to do city things...
Haha don't worry it's fine, we'll go :)
We don't have to go crazy tourist! Maybe just food....
Sounds good to me =p
I appreciate you sacrificing your hatred of NYC to appease me =P
It's not a problem =p lolz
I appreciate it. =P How did your final go!?
Eh, I'm feelin like an 80 probably =p
That's good!!
Not too shabby :) what r u up to?
Studying with Laurie (still) and FREAKING OUT cause our final is in a half hour
Unbelievable!! Ur ready :) u'll do great :)
You believe in me too much. =p But thanks sweetie, you're cute =)
Good luck on ur final sweetie!!!
Thanks!! I'll text you when I'm out =)
Told u u would do fine =p
....that wasn't so bad!
Ehh...I'm expecting a B in the class. I'll accept it grudgingly =P
Blah blah blah =p
Cut me some slack, I'm Asian =P
I MADE IT I MADE IT!!!
YOU'RE HOME FOR A WHOLE MONTH!!! You made it through the semester! Congrats, baby
What a doozy =p
Didn't think it would happen? =P
More or less =p
Against all odds, you live. =P What shall you do your first night home?
........ GETTIN HAMMERED!!!!
LIAR
I know =p probably just play games with the father =p
Haha. That sounds fun and relaxing =)
Good old game of age of mythology :)
Ooh, very nice! I'm jealous =P
Uh huh I'm sure =p lolz
I actually am, I don't wanna study =P
Lolz ur cute =p
Awe poor baby :(
Because ur immune system is low =p
Seriously debating going to bed now and studying for like 3 hours in the morning....my throat is bright red and I feel like death =(
I'll be fine, but why do I always get sick!?
Pls send me your immunity =P
Lolz if it was possible I'd do it =p
GIVE ME YOUR GOD SOUL
NO!!!
AND WHY NOT
Because u already have it silly
.....I'm embarrassed to say I fell asleep with this message open, and my face on top of phone
Way to go sweetie =p
I was tired....but now I am home and done
Hahah. I'm surprised you're up =P
Literally just woke up =p
......I can't =P
Lolz but I'm so comfy!!
Are you all snuggled up in bed? You're so cute =)
Hehe ☺
Gah!! I wish I were there with you
Wanna do something today?
Still not feeling great....skipped out on Neighborhood School today. I don't wanna get you sick =(
Awe my poor baby!!!! But snuggling is the best cure!!
It totally is.
Well tomorrow is my mommy's birthday but other than that I'm pretty good, Bucky comes in on the 22 and joe will be done with finals on Friday which means he'll be back probably Saturday
Okay! I don't want to take you away from your family times or anything, haha
Doesn't mean u can't join us!!
So very nice of you!
We would love to have u over for my mommy's birthday :)
=) Would that be tomorrow night?
Indeed it would be :)
That sounds lovely! =) Should I bring anything?
Even if I say no I know ur going to anyway, so bring something chocolate =p
You know me well. =P I'm thinking, if I nap now, I'll be feeling sufficiently better tonight....
Sounds reasonable to me :)
Good! Cause I know I'm seeing you tomorrow, but I just wanna see you =P
But I don't want to make you more sick
I know you're right.....
Well take a nap and then we'll see how you feel later
It's up to you too! I don't want to keep you from making other plans, all I know is I'll be here being lazy. =P Goodnight =)
Awe good night sweetie, love u :)
A shower and some rest have done me wonders! Throat is no longer painful, now I'm just kinda sleepy and weak =P
Haha ur adorable, would u like me to come over? :)
If you're free, I would love to have you =)
U wanna do Christmas gifts!?!?
OKAY!!! I have to wrap yours =P
DO IT!!! Also I'm bringing u soup =p
Ohh honey, you're too sweet! You don't have to
Made it home and my mother told me that there is a brand new baby panda with 24 hour live webcam on it
That's the cutest!! Please pass along the link! But good to hear you made it back =)
What r ur Christmas plans?
Christmas Eve, going to grandparents'. Christmas Day, potentially seeing Les Mis in movies....supposed to see my aunt, but I apparently don't have to go. =p What's up?
I was just curious, it seems that since my family got hit by sandy pretty bad everyone is kinda doing a private thing so I'm kinda plan-less
On Eve or actual Christmas? I'll ask, but I'm sure you could be my plus one =)
Actual Christmas :)
This gives us a perfect excuse to not go to our aunt's, nobody wants to =P
You can come over =)
Well I don't want to impose or anything =p
I'll solidify my plans when I actually get home, but wherever we are, you are more than welcome to come. We'd love to have you =)
Awe thanks sweetie :)
No problem! =) What's the plan for tonight?
The usual, cake and presents and stuffs, joe should be home in time :)
What time?
Well, we're out shopping right now, 6:30? Really u can come over whenever u want =p
Haha, no worries! Just let me know when you guys get in. =) WHAT DOES YOUR MOM WANT FOR HER BIRTHDAY
NOT FOOD
So.....no chocolate treats.....WHAT DOES SHE WANT THEN
Irrelevant point =p
What? Haha
It doesn't matter what u get her =p u don't have to get her anything =p
Wait. 1) is this a yes or a no to chocolate? 2) Scented stuff: cookies or pine trees?
No to chocolate, we have enough chocolate, pine trees =p
Fair enough, thank you =)
Where r u?
I was waiting for your cue that you guys were home. =P I'll leave now!
I said 6:30!! Lolz
Did u have dinner?
Ok then :)
I'm sorry!! I thought that was a guesstimate, haha. I'm sorry. I ate dinner already, thank you
Leaving now, see you in 45 =)
Made it back! Record time!
Speeding huh? Lol
Noooo! ....okay, I went a steady 5 over the speed limit at all times
Thatta girl =p
Why do I have a second wind now!? I'm wide awake
Go to sleep =
But I'm not sleepy!! And you're awake and you're cute.
But I have to wake up really early =p
Oh, are you going to SJV too? I don't wanna keep you up!! Sorry
It's fine sweetie =p
Wouldn't have stayed late either if I knew....you should get sleep
Blah =p
Don't you blah me, you just told me to sleep =P
Yeah but u need it =p
I do not! I am fine
Lies!!!
Why doesn't anyone believe me when I say this!?
Because u need sleep =p
Passed out.... "I'm so surprised," said no one.....
HA told u so =p
SHADDUP =P
I was up till like 3am lolz
W....why!?
Because I can =p lolz
But you'll be sleepy....
Yeah but I didn't feel like sleeping yet =p lolz
Make sure you sleep when you get home! I know I'm going to nap when I get in from tutoring
I'm already home and lounging in the chair we were in =p
That is a SERIOUSLY comfy chair, I almost passed out in it
I think u did for like 5 minutes =p
.....did I? I literally have no recollection =P
Not sure if you're up, but I love you =)
I love you too :)
Aw hi, how's your night?
Good, we played monopoly!! Mommy won =p how is ur night?
YAY!! My night is less exciting....got in from work around 1, and now I can't sleep =P
Awe sweetie!! Go to sleep!!!!
Everything is cold
Snuggle up under ur big covers!!
I have three layers of blanket, two pillows under my head, and Hugsy to snuggle with
Lol ur adorable =p
Because I'm a giant 5 year old? =p
I don't even remember which one hugsy is lol
Ah yes, the penguin, gotcha, I'm gonna try and go to sleep now, good night cutie, I love you, sleep tight, sweet dreams :)
Goodnight sweetie, I love you too! Sleep tight =)
Unfortunately, I can't get out of going to my aunt's on Christmas...
Hi cutie :)
Hi baby! =) What's up?
Nothin much, realizing that today is the 23rd and not the 22nd =p
....yes, tomorrow is Christmas Eve =P
Yeeeaaaaah totally thought I had another day =p
Nope! Haha. What do you have to do?
Finish shopping =p lolz we r going to the mall after we eat dinner to finish up and then gonna make a ridonka amount of things for cousins, what r ur plans for tomorrow?
That sounds delightful! Just going to grandparents' house, and not going into work because I refused =P
Way to say no sweetie!!! That sounds like a fun idea :)
Haha, I wasn't on schedule! And yup yup. =) Is the whole family coming over tomorrow?
We r going to our cousin's house and everyone seems to be coming to that :)
That sounds so nice! =) Wish I could join y'all, haha
Oh, what are your plans for New Years?
I do not know, I'm pretty sure we don't have new years plans =p
If you're free, Nicole will be moved into Woodbridge, she invited us over for the night =)
Tonight?
I wish I noticed this message when u sent it :(
Oh no, I meant New Years Eve!
I'll have to see if I can do that because that sounds wonderful! :)
Okay! Pls lmk
Oh and the wedding is January 18th btdubs =p
I know that. =P What time are you guys going, and when are you heading home? Just so I have a start and end time to request off from work =P
I DO NOT know...... Lolz
Tempted to just take all of Friday and Saturday off =P
That's a very good idea =p
Haha, I may. Just keep me posted on any developments, please
Yup yup :) how's it going?
All is good! Just waiting to leave for grandparents, haha. How is your Christmas Eve?
Just arrived at my aunt's house and everybody else is shuffling in now :)
That sounds lovely! =) Got the whole clan? Haha
Not the entire clan but close, it's my mom's side =p
That's probably more than my whole family combined =P
I mean..... I think there r about 20 here =p
Okay, we're about even. =P I can't wait for allllll the Christmas food!!!
Christmas emergency Dylan needs my truck coming to the rescue!!
What happened!?
Dylan's family needed my truck to get a snowblower from sears, so I got it and now they r figuring out where they want it =p
Haha. You're a hero! Is it supposed to snow....?
I think it's supposed to rain but the snowblowers a present for Mr. font
Ah, very nice! You saved Christmas =P
I try I try now I have to bring everybody else's gifts since I left the party with all the presents
Go go! Make Christmas happen!! Somehow we got on the topic of Ryan Fallon's sex life, yikes
Oh my and how exactly is that going?
Just....yikes. I do not need to know specifics =P
I want all the details
You....you do not
Either that, or you do and you'll fit right into this conversation
Maybe if I was there I would totally offer my opinion
Oh good heavens.....GET HERE =P
I am a little busy saving Christmas right now
You go, Glen Coco!
I wish I could be there though
It's okay cutie, we'll see each other soon =)
Indeed we will
￼It's snowing!!!!
YOU'RE SNOWING!!!
Not everyone but everything =p
He's got the right idea =p
Haha. How's your party?
Winding down really =p how about u?
We're playing Cards Against Humanity =P
TROLOLOL
You're missing all the talk of Ray....!
RAAAAAAYYYYYY i can only imagine what ur saying about him =p
The answer is yes
You know this for a fact.... Oh jeez
I've seen the outside of his house....
.......yikes
It is a scary and forbidden place......
It is where children's hopes and dreams go to die
Not willingly I might add.....
Not at all.....holy crops, I'm sleepy
U need to go to sleep so Santa can come!!!
Oh honey...... You're so cute
Hehe
Good!! I'm glad you finally believe me =P
BITCH U DIDN'T HAVE TO TELL ME I ALREADY KNOW!!!
WELL I AIN'T EVER TELLING YOU AGAIN
FINE BE THAT WAY U BEAUTIFUL LOVING CARING WOMAN!!
I THINK I WILL, YOU HANDSOME KIND-HEARTED GODLIKE SPECIMEN OF AMAN
AMAN!!!!
A....man.... Spelling is hard
Especially when you're hammered
Are you drunk? =P
Oh I'm totally trashed =p
Trolol. I would like to see drunk Kevin
Eventually honey, eventually =p
I'm going to sleep now....goodnight sweetie, I love you! MERRY CHRISTMAS
Good night sweetie, in gonna finish wrapping stuffs :) I love you too, sleep tight, sweet dreams MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!
You wrap those presents!! Merry Christmas to you and your family =)
Kickawesome? Lolz
THAT....is a kickawesome hat
I didnt even think to say it like that haha it's so much better now =p
Bringing back the Homestar Runner vernacular =P
I'm gonna try to bring that back. =P UGH LONGEST MASS EVER. The homily had nothing to do with Christmas at all
Some people =p laaaaaaame
I know, right? =p How's your Christmas!? Did Santa bring you good gifts?
Yes he did :) Santa brought us an Xbox 360 with kinect :)
Now you have alllll the gaming systems!! That's awesome =)
I know right!?!? Now we just need a wiiu =p
Wiiu?
The new wii system is the wiiU :)
What makes it different than the Wii? =p
U never heard of this!? Its different because it has an interactive controller with a screen on it that is touch sensitive =p
NO WAY THAT'S SO COOL!!!! I wanna play =P
I can't believe u never heard of it =l
=p
I don't know much of anything =P
Ur a silly head =p
YOU'RE a silly head!! Santa got me a new DDR mat, two pairs of boots, a backpack for school, and some makeup. LOLZ
Hahaha my mom almost got u a new backpack =p
Did she really!? How did she know? Haha
Because she was questioning me and asking me how u go to the city and what u use to carry things =p
Haha, aww. I'm sure I'll beat my current one up soon enough =P
Haha so r u still at ur Christmas party?
Noooo, I'm home now being sleepy and lazy cause I have to get up at 4am =\
Awe if u didn't need to be up that early I would invite u to come with us =\
I know sweetie, and thank you. =) Are you there now?
No we left like 10 minutes ago =p
You guys start your celebrations late, haha. Rob O'Leary's?
Yes, this isn't our usual thing, they just went to see les mis
OOOH JEALOUS
Being me puppy!!!!!
She's so cute =p
So so cute!! Tell the family I say hello =)
They all say hi =p
Haha. Y'all are adorable
No ur adorable =p
No, you're adorable!!!!
SILENCE HUMAN!!!
You will never take my words!!!!!
Then I shall take ur life!!!!
How can you from where you are!?
The matrix
The whole world is a lie....
UR A LIE!!!
You're right.....I.....am Hannah Montana
I KNEW IT!!!!!!
Yes....you know every time I said I was at Victoria's Secret? I was actually at various concerts
I see how it is....... This is what it is......
Yes....are you prepared to date a washed up pop superstar?
Very well........
I c how it is =p
As do I....If you can't love me as Hannah Montana, I don't know how we can proceed....... =P
Bum bum BAAAAHHHH
THE PLOT THICKENS! Can love overcome the fact that Hannah Montana is simply untalented? Tune in next week....
It's a devastating turn of events...
Oh, my heart hurts now...
It's not a very good show to be honest =p
Haha. It's just awful. Implausible concept as well
Because no one would ever willingly date Hannah Montana
....... Well damn....
PEOPLE DO THOUGH
MILEY IS ENGAGED TO THOR
She did well for herself.....
But y would he stoop so low......
He is a god, he can do better =P
Sif is 10x hotter....
She totally is. Things to consider.....Halloween one year? LOLZ
That would be awesome =p
Nicole also suggested Hercules and Meg =P
That could work :)
Haha. I'm getting ahead of myself, I just like dressing up and I like you =P
Ur adorable, we can definitely pull that off haha
I am so sad to be awake
Go to sleep =p
I'm leaving for work in a half hour
All right then don't go to sleep =p
I won't. =P Why are YOU awake!?
...... Oh no reason...... Going to sleep now though baha
Haha, aww. Goodnight sweetie, I love you =)
I love u too, have fun at work :)
No on call for me, heading home, woooo!! I hope you're sleeping peacefully and having sweet dreams
I am so good at sleeping its ridonk =p
Yes :) I had an interesting dream to =p
Did you just wake up....
Oh oh oh! I wanna hear!!

All right it actually wasn't that interesting, I was at ocean gate and I was meeting a bunch of new people and we r all hanging out playing tennis but montclair people were there and Christian showed up eventually and I was trying to learn all their names and my soccer coach from freshman year was there and instead of 2 tennis courts there were three but the last one was extremely small and wasn't really a court it was a trampoline fenced in and I injured my ankle and was bleeding on my new white sneakers but some of the new people offered to help me hop back to ocean gate so I could ice it and then I woke up.....
That sounds....kind of painful. I don't understand your dreams =P
Yeah this one was really quite like an average day =p
I had a dream that Carissa from work got hit by a bus, and was casually texting Charlay and me about it....we had to drive out to the hospital and kept getting more lost and I woke up
Awe poor baby :(
It was quite a relief to see them both at work this morning, haha. What are ya up to?
Playin halo 4 with joe and dad :) what about u?
￼Testing out my new arcade quality DDR mat!!!
Wooooo!!!! Party!!!!!
Haha, yup. I gotta get back on the wagon, gotta look good for dat wedding =P
U already look great :)
You're obligated to tell me that....haha. But I appreciate it anyway, thanks sweetie =)
Ur beautiful :)
Oh stop, you're making me blush
But ur so cute when u blush!!!
You're just cute all the time =)
Oooo good one, I applaud that come back
Don't be a jackass =P
Haha it was good!! I enjoyed it =p
Gooood playing "laser game keht 2.0" :)
Shaddup. =P how is your night?
....what is that!? =P
￼￼Name of the game is to shoot the enemy pharaoh
It's quite fun, we're tied at 2-2 right now
NICE!!!! That looks awesome
I'm close.... I mean if all goes according to plan then I shall win
You gotta win!!!!!
You must bring victory! FOR ASLAN
Failed but it was a very good match =p
I'm proud of you, cutie =P
I AM UNWORTHY!!!!!
You will always be worthy of love!!!!
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSASSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
Yesas? Lolz
Typing is hard. Maybe imagine that's like a snake hissing
A snake am I? Let's just see how snake-like I can be!!!!
Indeed it is =p
.........is that from a Disney movie? It's super familiar
......Aladdin?
Yup yup!! Good job sweetie :)
Hehe, d'aw shucks. I guess I'm not so rusty on the movies
Look at u, bein all smartsy =p
That's what they say =P
Oh I'm sure that's verbatim what they say =p
I bet they tell ur cute and beautiful too :)
IT IS.
